message: Maybe relevant to our interests? http://redbullusa.com/Creation
We were one of the first to register.  We need to assemble a team of 4.  http://blog.makezine.com/archive/2011/03/red-bull-got-hacked-by-alpha-one-labs.html
Team of 4? any idea what A1L will be making? I guess you have to wait for the announcement thing, is that how it works?

Hello Alpha One Labs

I wanted to send you an invite to attend the Red Bull Creation Qualifier Topic Release Party at 3rd Ward next Friday April 8 at 8pm.

We are excited that you all have been very engaged in the custom invite kit and decoding the circuit board, would be great to meet in person and answer any questions that you have. The Red Bull Creation event team will be at the event as well.

Here is all the info and there is an RSVP email address- please share with anyone you think would be interested in attending and learning more about Red Bull Creation.




Thanks and hope you can make it next Friday so we can meet.

Hit me back with any questions.


Josh Greene
Field Marketing Manager
Brooklyn/Queens/Long Island
Red Bull North America
585-329-1320
